data.name: Dark Black Golang theme
data.description:
Dark black theme for golang.org, go.dev, godoc, Play.golang.org and tour.golang.com(for almost all localisations).

Let me know if you want to help with the style!

data.name: dolosfile
data.description: Somewhat complete mono volafile.org that is the result of 40min hard work. It is the best!!!!

data.name: SAO Theme for Facebook(Beta) English update
data.description:
Only Vietnamese and English Now


Sword Art Online Theme for Facebook(Beta) Looking for some Sword Art Online theme for Facebook, this is just for you, this change a lot of things. Just install and try it out.

This is just a BETA version, update more in the future. There will be some problems. I always looking forward to receive your suggests, comments.


*Please set Facebook to light version, if you want to try but your language is not support, please set Facebook language to Vietnamese or English(More languages in the future), this is just for new Version of Facebook. Roadmap: _Fix bugs(Always)(Please comment if you see a bug) _Change some GUI, Icon(30%) _Support more Language(Always) _Add some Easter Eggs(In Progress) _More Version Theme(ALO, GGO, Alicization) (Far Future) _Welcome Screen and Login Page(In progress) _More special features(Sometimes) _More Customizable(In progress) Thank You.

user.name: SP Dream
user.about:
I am SPdream, I'm still a newcomer to this.
CSS is the first coding language I learn!
*I hope that I can learn and practice more in the future*

data.name: Habrahabr Darkness
data.description: Based on "Habrahabr & Geektimes & TM Tango theme" and including the latest fixes. The style continues to develop and update. If something will breaks, please give me to know by twitter or telegram: @valsaven Feel free to send your PR here: https://github.com/valsaven/userstyles Thanks to: incept0r, python273, iGusev, TotalCaesar659

a.favorite{margin-right:101px!important}.comments_count{background-color:#555753!important;color:#eeeeec!important;border:none!important}.comments_count.has_new{background-color:#b8b8b6!important;color:#555753!important;border-color:#272c2d!important}.comments_count{border-radius:30px!important;width:40px!important;height:40px!important;vertical-align:bottom!important;padding-top:13px!important;display:inline-block!important}.copyright,.similar_posts .title{border:none!important}.flag,a.edit:after{background:0 0!important;font-size:12px!important;vertical-align:top!important;background:#555753!important;color:#eeeeec!important;border-radius:2px!important;margin-top:3px!important}.comments .comment+.comment,.list_items .list_item,.posts .post{border-color:#babdb6!important}.layout__row,.layout__row_navbar{background-color:#2e3436!important;border:0 solid #2e3436!important}}@-moz-document domain('m.habr.com'){.logo:after{content:'H'!important}}@-moz-document url-prefix('http://tmfeed.ru'),url-prefix('https://tmfeed.ru'){.Sidebar .block_brainstorage .title,.Sidebar .block_freelansim .title{font-size:24px!important}.Sidebar .block_freelansim .title{margin-bottom:20px!important}}

data.name: Twitter Dark Lume (3-in-1)
data.description: Guide Twitter thread Features: --3 color themes you can choose from (Light, Dim, and Lights out) through regular color theme picker of Twitter (Display->Background); --Condensed box-like left sidebar look, with larger userpic and your twitter handle; --Hide promotional tweets; --Breaks between tweets for easier timeline reading; --Wide topbar (like legacy theme) --Expand Images --You can enter a number between 0 - 360 to recolor themes 1 & 2 (i.e. from dark red to dark green) Help If you 🧡this, check out my other script for Twitter,i Gif & Video Downloader

data.name: GameSpark 配色＆フォント変更
data.description:
Game*Sparkさんの配色とフォントを変更します。

「body」のfont-familyの値を書き換えることで好みのフォントに変更できます。

※フォントを変更する場合はページ上部のボタンがずれる場合があるため
　「control-list」のwidth　および「item--social」のmargin-left
　の値を調整する必要があります。
